name: AdRotater Email Ad Reports
author: Xylus Themes

sections.description:
AdRotater Email Ad Reports is an add-on plugin for AdRotate plugin. This plugin adds functionality to send emails to your advertisers with monthly ad reports.

AdRotater Email Ad Reports also provide functionality to edit email template and u can set as per your Requirement and send ad reports to your advertisers.
sections.installation:
1. Install and Activate AdRotate Plugin if it is not activated.
  2. Install Adrotater Email Add-on either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install and Activate AdRotate Plugin if it is not activated.
  2. Install Adrotater Email Add-on either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

What is basic need to activate this plugin?

You need to install and activate AdRotate plugin to active this plugin.

I can active this plugin without Adrotate plugin?

No, You must need a AdRotate plugin to active this plugin.

short_description: AdRotater Email Ad Reports allow you to send monthly ad reports to advertisers.
